**[Backyard](http://www.backyardforestville.com/)** (Forestville, CA)

![backyard forestville](../images/backyard-forestville_002.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: sorrel, chickweed, miner’s lettuce, radish, daikon, mushrooms, wild flowers, seaweed (dried)

How to order: Email Marianna Gardenhire, pastry/chef owner of Backyard at [marianna@backyardforestville.com](mailto:marianna@backyardforestville.com)

**[F.E.E.D. Sonoma](http://feedsonoma.com/)** (Sebastopol, CA)

![FEED](../images/FEED_002.jpg)

How to order: Join FEED at [http://feedsonoma.com/join-us/](http://feedsonoma.com/join-us/)

**Five Springs Farm** (Petaluma, CA)

![Five Springs](../images/Five-Springs_002.jpg)

Check back soon for more information on how to order

How to order: Contact Ron Finley at [ron@ronfinley.com](mailto:ron@ronfinley.com)

**[Kiss The Ground Garden](https://www.kisstheground.com/garden/)** (Venice, CA)

![Kiss the Ground](../images/Kiss-the-Ground_002.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: Mallow, lamb’s quarters, calendula, borage, cardoons

How to order: Contact garden manager Matt Finkelstein at [matt@kisstheground.com](mailto:matt@kisstheground.com)

**[Live Oak Farm](http://feedsonoma.com/map/live-oak-farm/)** (Petaluma, CA)

![Live Oak Farm](../images/Live-Oak-Farm_002.jpg)

How to order: Contact farm manager Michael Scott [compostisma@gmail.com](mailto:compostisma@gmail.com)

**[The Living Wild Project](http://www.livingwild.org/)**

![Living Wild](../images/Living-Wild_002.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: Ground manzanita berry sugar, ground toyon berry, oak nut flour, douglas fir tips, incense cedar for flavoring or drinks

How to order: Email Alicia Funk at alicia@livingwild.org

**[Marin Roots Farm](https://marinrootsfarm.wordpress.com/)** (Marin County, CA)

![Marin Roots](../images/Marin-Roots_002.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: miner’s lettuce, chickweed, speckled wood sorrel, purple wood sorrel, radish flowers, thistle, rapini flower, meadfoam leaf and flower

How to order: Email Moira with quantities desired at [marinrootswholesale@gmail.com](mailto:marinrootswholesale@gmail.com)

**[Morchella Wild Foods](http://www.morchellawildfoods.com/)** (San Francisco, CA)

![Morchella Wild Foods](../images/morchella_2017.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: maple blossoms, bracken fern, wild pea tendrils, miner’s lettuce, candy caps, three-cornered leeks, strawberry madrone, chrysanthemum, radish, mustard, nasturtium, cherry blossoms, chervil, oxalis, daylilies, new zealand spinach.

How to order: please call or text (415) 662-8721 or email [bryan@morchellawildfoods.com](mailto:bryan@morchellawildfoods.com)

![Sonoma Herb Exchange](../images/Sonoma-Herb-Exchange_002.jpg)

How to order: Contact Director BJ Avery with desired herbs at [herbexch@sonic.net](mailto:herbexch@sonic.net)

**[Top Leaf Farms / Farm the Roof](http://www.topleaffarms.com/index.html)** (Oakland, CA)

![Top Leaf Farms (2)](../images/Top-Leaf-Farms-2_002.jpg)

Items available for WFFW: Consult Top Leaf Farms’ [Chef Order Sheet](http://www.topleaffarms.com/chef-fresh-sheet.html), as well as fava beans, pea shoots, mint, thyme, oregano, dandelion greens

How to order: Email Benjamin Fahrer at [farmtheroof@gmail.com](mailto:farmtheroof@gmail.com)
